          <title>
            <string language="en">Saponification of a triglyceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saponifikation eines Triglyzerids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Saponification d'un triglycéride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saponification de um triglyceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saponificazione di un trigliceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Saponification triglyceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Saponificación de un triglyceride</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the saponification of a triglyceride forming the propane-1,2,3-triol and a sodium salt of fatty acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

            <string language="en">3-triol</string>
          </keyword>

          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Saponifikation eines Triglyzerids, welches das propane-1,2,3-triol und
ein Natriumsalz der Fettsäure bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
saponification d'un triglycéride formant le propane-1,2,3-triol et un
sel de sodium d'acide gras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para o 
saponification de um triglyceride que dá forma ao propane-1,2,3-triol
e a um sal do sodium do ácido fatty.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la 
saponificazione di un trigliceride che forma il propane-1,2,3-triol e 
un sale del sodio di acido grasso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για 
saponification triglyceride που διαμορφώνει το 
προπάνιο-1.2.3-τρηολ και ένα άλας νατρίου του λιπαρού οξέος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
saponificación de un triglyceride que forma el propane-1,2,3-triol y 
una sal del sodio del ácido graso.</string>
          </description>
